title: Birds of a Feather at Loggerheads

infobox.Title:: Birds of a Feather at Loggerheads
infobox.Japanese title:: 似た者同士が犬猿の仲  (Nitamono Dōshi ga Ken'en no Naka)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Michitaka Yamamoto  Shigenori Taniguchi

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Shiori Matsuda as Kimiko Kuwana  Sho Okumura as Shingo Hosoda  Nozomi Furuki as Waitress A  Yasuyuki Kase as Hiroshi Kagazume  Takashi Nagasako as Akira Hashizume

sections.Situation: Akira Hashizume and Hiroshi Kagazume are arguing over something at a restaurant. Hiroshi warns Akira about how their previous scoop had created a situation of attempted murder. Before leaving, Akira subtly picks up the wrong one of the two identical flasks. Later, Hiroshi is found dead near the bridge.

sections.Resolution: Hiroshi felt guilty for doing so and thought of confessing to their crime. Akira, however, was not of the same opinion. Both of them devised the same plan to murder each-other. After he executed his plan halfway, Hiroshi felt guilty so he committed suicide and tried to rope in Akira for his murder by deliberately setting up the scene.
